info.title: Oja Ewa Pro API
info.description: Comprehensive e-commerce API for the Oja Ewa Pro platform. Supports user authentication, seller management, product catalog, order processing, business profiles, notifications, and administrative functions.

tags.name: User Auth
tags.description: User authentication endpoints including registration, login, password reset, and social login

tags.name: Seller Profile
tags.description: Seller profile management for merchants and vendors

tags.name: Products
tags.description: Product catalog management including CRUD operations and search

tags.name: Business Profiles
tags.description: Business profile management for different business types

409.description: User already has a seller profile

403.description: User does not have an approved seller profile

get.summary: Get product suggestions based on filters

403.description: Not authorized to update this product
Not authorized to delete this product

get.summary: List all orders for the authenticated user

403.description: Not authorized to view this order
Not authorized to review this entity
Not authorized to view this order's reviews

post.summary: Upload a file for a business profile

get.summary: Get category items by type and slug

items.description: Array of item IDs (products, business profiles, or blogs)

get.summary: Get business profile details by category and ID

bearerAuth.description: JWT token obtained from login or registration

AuthToken.description: Authentication response with token and user data
